decks.name: Route Parameters
decks.description: How and when to use them!

decks.name: Conditional Rendering
decks.description: All about conditional rendering in React.

cards.front: Which hook would you use to navigate to a new page???
What is the name of the hook used to re-route a user?
How would you import the useParams() hook?

Rewrite this url to use parameter tokens: 
https://localhost:3000/user/42/post/17

How would you get the user id from this address using the useParams() hook?
https://localhost:3000/user/:userId/post/:postId

What would be the best way to write a conditional in the middle of a render?
a. if statement
b. ternary operator without braces
c. {ternary operator} with braces
